```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(bigrquery)
```

Setting up the project:
```{r}
project <- "rafal-mannheim"
```

Setting up the connection:
```{r}
con <- dbConnect(
  bigrquery::bigquery(),
  project = "bigquery-public-data",
  dataset = "chicago_crime",
  billing = project)

con
```

Available tables:
```{r}
dbListTables(con)
```

How the data looks like:
```{sql connection= con}
SELECT *
FROM crime
WHERE year = 2015
LIMIT 50
```

Data extraction:
```{sql connection= con}
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM crime
WHERE year = 2015
```
